text: Emilio Molinari (born 12 November 1939 in Milan) is an Italian politician. From 1984-1985 he served as a Member of the European Parliament, representing Italy for Proletarian Democracy. From 1992–1994 he served as a Senator, representing Lombardy for the Federation of the Greens. ==References== Category:Living people Category:1939 births Category:MEPs for Italy 1984–1989 Category:People from Milan Category:Proletarian Democracy MEPs Category:Proletarian Democracy politicians Category:Federation of the Greens politicians
title: Emilio Molinari
